name: BelTek Systems Design
overview: BelTek Systems Design, Inc. designs, sells, and implements wireless mobility solutions. It specializes in mobile sales and route accounting solutions with wireless communications. The companyâ€™s solutions are used to support companies that involve in direct store delivery, field sales and service, asset management, surveys, vehicle inspection, and merchandising. It offers a solution suite, which includes Route Assistant, Route Administrator, and T-Server!. The companyâ€™s solution suite integrates sales, delivery, and off-truck-sales functions with back-office systems, allowing clients to store, track, and manage routes, customers, products, pricing groups, payment methods, discounts, and orders, as well as control and manage inventory and accounts receivables, control product loss and shrinkage, lower operating costs, and fewer errors in processing orders. It also provides various hardware options; and professional services, including system consulting, project management, custom development, training, and support. BelTek Systems Design, Inc. was founded in 1990 and is based in Dieppe, Canada. As of November 5, 2008, BelTek Systems Design Inc. operates as a subsidiary of HighJump Software, LLC.

acquisition.source_description: HighJump Software acquires BelTek Systems Design, a provider of direct store delivery solutions
